gains and greenhouse gas reductions from using a light-duty hydraulic hybrid system. "Hydraulic hybrid vehicle technology is one more promising path worth pursuing in the effort to reduce our carbon footprint," Sergio Marchionne said. It has shown substantial increases in fuel economy when compared with traditional powertrains in the same type of vehicles. Both parties hope to reduce the size and complexity of the hybrid system and produce a technology that is sensitive to the needs of drivers for smooth and quiet operation. now be determined by their school, if it is an academy, or by their local authority. Michael Gove has said he is "deeply sceptical" of the General Teaching Council for England and believes it does little to raise teaching standards or professionalism. The watchdog is responsible for registering teachers and investigating alleged cases of misconduct. The quango takes more than Â£ 36 each year from every teacher and gives them "hardly anything back", Michael Gove argues.

A Cambridgeshire academic has been asked by the government to re-write parts of the school history syllabus. Dr Sean Lang helped found the Better History Group and is BBC Radio Cambridgeshire's Dr History. I, and various others, think that students are being required to know a lot less now than they used to, said the Anglia Ruskin University lecturer.
